content.rendered:
2022 Kentucky Derby Hotels & Accommodations

Roadtrips offers first class accommodations in a range of hotels near to Churchill Downs to suit all tastes and budgets. Most of our properties are centrally located in downtown Louisville, ideal for experiencing this wonderful southern city and of course, the Kentucky Derby excitement. For a luxurious experience, we suggest the contemporary boutique 21C Museum Hotel or The Brown Hotel, one of Louisville’s most treasured landmark luxury hotels. For an authentic Kentucky Derby experience, you may want to consider staying at the official hotel of the Kentucky Derby, the Galt House. If comfortable, contemporary accommodations are what you are after, you can also consider the Crowne Plaza Louisville Airport, offering southern charm and all the amenities you need for an enjoyable stay in Louisville.
